Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Latrobe
ShortDescription: EB 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, & Cicero, due to street blockage near 63rd/Latrobe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, & Cicero, due to street blockage near 63rd/Latrobe.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Wilson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Wilson.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
